fulltext:
You were born to
GROWTH EXPERT
Huyen Nguyen
Hi, I'm Huyền, Nguyễn Hạ Huyền. 
I  wish  to  apply  for  the  Growth  Expert  position  at  Triip.me.  I'm  working  toward  being  a  professional
Business Consultant in the technology industry and have a long-standing interest in the fast-growing start-
up environment to make a significant impact on the business.
My  current  position  as  Assistant  BCI  (Branded  Content Integration) at Dentsu Redder - the most international-
award-winning   independent   agency  in  Vietnam,  has  provided  me  with  the  opportunity  to  perform  project
management  well  under  pressure  in high-performance and fast-paced environment of advertising. With mainly  
handling  2  projects during working here, I'm able to ensure integrated work delivered successfully for the clients
from the beginning, with high-level client service. Moreover,  this  position  builds  me  an  in-depth  knowledge  of
current market and present to C-Level how to apply marketing tool for each business, especially FMCG and F&B.
As a Account Manager after passed 3 months of account management trainee program at Adstart  Media - a  fast-
growing startup, agency based in Singapore,  I was responsible for seeking and collaborating  with  publishers and
advertisers to meet monthly revenue goals. My accounts were mainly in the area of tech, apps,  OTA industry with
the  demand  of  users  all over the world, so I had to be a fast learner and strongly motivated to catch up with the  
latest trends and technology, ability to statistic and analyze data.
During  my  tenure at university, through extracurricular activities and internships as well as part-time jobs, I have
accumulated  specialized  skills  such  as  event  management,  content creating,  design,  using sales ads  engine...
Additionally, I have developed leadership skills through leader positions at student projects inside and outside the
university,  such  as  UNESCO-CEP's  projects.  And one of my student awards  I was most proud of is the first prize
of Scientific Research Contest at UEL, with the subject "Application of game-based teaching in teaching economics
in university", as I can impact on people's education by tech.
In the next step, I think work at Triip.me is in the best interest of  fulfilling  my  career  goals.  Because  it's time for
me to stick with a specific product and expand the market for this product in a fast-growing start-up,  where  I can
build my entrepreneurial spirit and satisfy with curiosity about technology. And I have well prepared to work here,
by learning many marketing skills,  understanding  traffic  delivered,  the  process  of  new  products  launching  in
various models of business.  So I welcome the opportunity for working at Triip.me with passion and progressive.
Kindly feel free to contact me to arrange an interview at  your  convenience.  Thank you very much for considering
my application for candidacy.
(+84) 702 677 876
hahuyennguyen149@gmail.com
https://www.linkedin.com/in/huyennguyen149/
Ha Huyen
GROWTH EXPERT
DOB: 14/09/1997
Phone: (+84) 702 677 876
Email: hahuyennguyen149@gmail.com
INTRODUCTION
ENTJ Personality with a hunger for
learning new, creative mindset and full of
life and energy. Having a crush on
Business Consulting to make every
solution better and smarter.
Intent to work at a daily innovative and
digital workplace, where I can contribute
its sustainable growth.
Keyword: 
#BusinessConsulting #Marketing
#ProjectManagement
EDUCATION
Bachelor of International Business
(2015 - 2019)
University of Economics and Law
GPA: 3.0/4.0
SKILLS
Digital Marketing
Professional Client Service
Critical Thinking
Strong Presentation
Flexible Interpersonal
Creative Problem-solving
Microsoft Office
Facebook Ads
Graphic Design
Video Editing
SEO/SEM
Email Marketing
LANGUAGE
English: IELTS 6.5 - Fluently
American Sign Language
INTERESTS
Business Reading - Inspriring people
Art & Design - Discovering the culture
WORK EXPERIENCES
ASSISTANT BRANDED CONTENT INTEGRATION
Dentsu Redder (Creative Agency) | 4/2019 - 7/2019
Project Management (100%): pitching, execution, report
Collaborating with internal team and all third parties
Key  clients  to  be  in  charged:  Suntory  PepsiCo,  P&G,
Vinamilk, Biti's, Minh Long, MMA Vietnam...
ACCOUNT MANAGER (6 months)
ACCOUNT MANAGEMENT TRAINEE (3 months)
Adstart Media (Digital Agency) | 7/2018 - 3/2019
Account Management (100%): account performance
Expanded new clients & affiliate networks
Key  campaigns  to  be  in  charged:  Amazon,  Shopee,
Lazada, Zalo, Itunes Music, Tiktok... (mobile app).
DIGITAL MARKETING INTERN
Dale Carnegie Vietnam | 3/2018 - 6/2018
Creating  digital  content  on  email  marketing,  website
and  social  media  platforms;  running  facebook ads to
gain post reach daily.
Implementing new campaigns for promotion. 
CEO ASSISTANT (PART-TIME)
QHome (Homestay Start-up) | 9/2017 - 12/2017
Supporting CEO in daily tasks, schedule timeline.
Proposing promotional  activities  for  launching  a new
homestay which got fully booked after 10 days.
Check-in, check-out and solving customers's problem.
MARKETING INTERN
Arena Multimedia | 6/2017 - 8/2017
Promoting courses via social media, campaigns, events.
Making marketing calls to set appointments, introduce
about Arena Multimedia courses and events.
AWARDS
First Prize - Scientific Research Contest of UEL.
Thesis   title:   "Application  of  game-based  teaching  in
economics university education".
Analyzing information to design theme & rules of game;
planning & conducting experiments; writing reviews.
ACTIVITIES
CONTENT LEADER
Talent Generation 2018 - UNESCO-CEP | 9/2017 - 6/2018
Best performance in the 1st month - the first volunteer
was promoted to team leader.
Managing  content  team, communication planning and
executing (social media & events).
Increasing  Facebook fans by 80% through social media
content and online contests; gaining  1,5  million  reach;
gaining 150% KPI of the number of participants.
AMBASSADOR
P2A Journey On Campus 2017, Bangkok (Thailand)
Selected as one of 20 ambassadors nationwide  for  the
3-month  program  for  enhancing  leadership  skill and
cultural exchange among Asian young leaders.
PRESIDENT, HEAD OF COMMUNICATION
IER 360 of UEL | 9/2015 - 9/2018
(Fanpage: www.facebook.com/ier360/)
Managing nearly 40 members and directing the growth
with  assertiveness and motivation - built it became the
best student organization of UEL in 2017.
Managing  creative  team to increase brand awareness.
Project  Manager  (The  Recruitment  Project 2017) - got
300 candidates, 30 volunteers.
Communication Leader (Magic Window IV 2017, English
Music Contest - nationwide)  -  got 1M reaches on social
media, invited 5 media sponsors.
REFERENCES
Mr. Vinnie
Ms. An Le
Ms. Linh Nguyen
Account Manager of Adstart Media
Project Manager of UNESCO-CEP 
Master, Research Instructor
Phone: (+84) 79 2319 225
Phone: (+84) 39 5199 101
Email: vinh@adstartmedia.com
Email: an.le@todayvoice.org
Phone: (+84) 93 4099 987
Email: linhntp@uel.edu.vn
Ha Huyen
GROWTH EXPERT
DOB: 14/09/1997
Phone: (+84) 702 677 876
Email: hahuyennguyen149@gmail.com
WORK HIGHLIGHTS IN DETAILS
ASSISTANT BRANDED CONTENT INTEGRATION (BCI)
Dentsu Redder (Creative Agency) | 4/2019 - 7/2019
Project Management (100%): supporting senior BCI to handle project execution in paper work, both
quality of IMC Plan, financial performance, measured by business impact and creative success.
Collaborating with internal team (Creative planning team, Procurement team, Design team, Accounting
team) and all third parties (Media, Event Booking, PR  Booking, Production House…) and monitoring
their performance to ensure integrated work delivered successfully for the clients.
Making the report of project performance and recommendations.
Key clients to be in charged: Suntory PepsiCo, P&G, Vinamilk, Biti's, Minh Long, MMA Vietnam...
Skills gained:
Time management under high pressure environment
Effective communication with internal team and clients
Finance negotiation
Understanding business's insights to applying specific marketing tool
Synthesize and analyze project efficiency
Achievement:
Be allowed to manage 2 projects independently after 2 months instead of 6 months (Suntory PepsiCo's
project and MMA Vietnam's project).
SPVB's project: meet daily potential engagement on social media (1000 engages)
MMA Vietnam's project: meet daily potential leads from digital ads for event ticket sales (100 leads)
ACCOUNT MANAGER (1/2019 - 3/2019)
ACCOUNT MANAGEMENT TRAINEE (9/2018 - 12/2018)
Adstart Media (Digital Agency) | 9/2018 - 3/2019
Account Management (100%): Delivering online traffic (CPA/CPI) from publisher's accounts (15 active)
to mobile apps campaigns of advertiser's accounts (5 active).
Seeking out and partnering with new top performing publishers and advertisers (Ad Networks, Media
Buyers, Affiliate Networks, freelancers, direct advertisers...).
Setting up and monitoring performance of the digital ad campaigns on own affiliate platform.
Analyzing report, partner traffic, to recommend strategic improvements.
Key campaigns to be in charged: mobile apps - Amazon, Agoda, Traveloka, Shopee, Lazada, Zalo,
Itunes Music, Tiktok...
Skills gained:
Effective English written and verbal communication with international team and partners
Systematic thinking and data analysis
Fast learner and strongly motivated in a fast-growing start-up
Experience working with affiliate tracking platforms and online media buying models
Achievement:
Expanded 50% new clients & affiliate networks.
Reached 150% KPI of sales in the first quarter of 2019.
